name: mushroom season (Ash K, amber hope, Maxim Loboda, regalunicorn)
name_original: mushroom season (Ash K, amber hope, Maxim Loboda, regalunicorn)
description:
Originally made for Indiepocalypse x kuš! collaboration, support them to let things like this happen!

  • become a hermit who lives in the woods
  • collect weird mushrooms
  • talk to critters of the forest
  • enjoy nature

Original idea and Art by Lote Vilma
Developed by Amber Hope, Maks Loboda, Ash K
